mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, name, waybill_no, policyholder_name, policyholder_company, policyholder_mobile, transport_company, transport_name, transport_mobile, goods_name, goods_units,weight, goods_value, deliver_date, transport_scope, costs, departure_province_id, departure_city_id, departure_area_id, destination_province_id, destination_city_id, destination_area_id, user_id
mapper.select: select a.id,a.order_no as waybillNo, b.name as transportCompany, c.surname as transporterSurname,c.name as transporterName,c.mobile as transporterMobile, d.departure_province_id as departureProvinceId, d.departure_city_id as departureCityId, d.departure_area_id as departureAreaId, d.destination_province_id as destinationProvinceId, d.destination_city_id as destinationCityId, d.destination_area_id as destinationAreaId, d.deliver_date as deliverDate, d.weight, d.goods_units as goodsUnits from t_waybill a left join t_company b on a.transporter_company_id = b.id left join t_user c on a.transporter_id = c.id left join t_order d on a.order_id = d.id where a.shipper_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and now() > d.deliver_date
mapper.insert: insert into t_insurance (id, update_date, desp, name, waybill_no, policyholder_name, policyholder_company, policyholder_mobile, transport_company, transport_name, transport_mobile, goods_name, goods_units,weight, goods_value, deliver_date, transport_scope, costs, departure_province_id, departure_city_id, departure_area_id, destination_province_id, destination_city_id, destination_area_id, user_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyholderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyholderCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyholderMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{deliverDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{transportScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{departureProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departureCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departureAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destinationProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destinationCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destinationAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
